name: Zadina_Mkampa

attributes.name: Cybernetics
values: Left arm and half of head

content:
Zadina Mkampa was a human female doctor and a member of the Nihil marauder organization during the High Republic Era. Mkampa possessed a cybernetic left arm, with the left side of the doctor's head also having been replaced by cybernetics.
Zadina Mkampa was created for the Star Wars: The High Republic publishing initiative, and was first revealed in concept art showcased in the fifth episode of Star Wars: The High Republic Show on September 15, 2021. She later debuted in the 2022 middle grade novel The High Republic: Mission to Disaster, written by Justina Ireland.
